triplets: Plant grown in a container for decorative or functional purposes
Home decor, air purification, gardening, gifts, and landscaping
Soil, plant, pot, and sometimes decorative elements
Plant, pot, soil, roots, and sometimes drainage holes

Nurseries, garden centers, and plant growers

Months to years depending on plant type and care
